org.apache.drill.exec.memory

Class DrillByteBufAllocator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.drill.exec.memory.DrillByteBufAllocator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.netty.buffer.ByteBufAllocator

    public class DrillByteBufAllocator
extends Object
implements io.netty.buffer.ByteBufAllocator
    An implementation of ByteBufAllocator that wraps a Drill BufferAllocator. This allows the RPC layer to be accounted and managed using Drill's BufferAllocator infrastructure. The only thin different from a typical BufferAllocator is the signature and the fact that this Allocator returns ExpandableByteBufs which enable otherwise non-expandable DrillBufs to be expandable.
